title: The Good the Bad and the Trending 2/28: Barry Sanders, James Harden, MDMA Wine, Apple Stock
itunes:title: The Good the Bad and the Trending 2/28: Barry Sanders, James Harden, MDMA Wine, Apple Stock
description:
On this edition of The Good, the Bad and the Trending Jack and Miles discuss the Barry Sanders jersey Garth Brooks was wearing, James Harden throwing shade at tall players, a woman has passed by drinking one sip of MDMA Wine, the DOW is down the most points ever and Apple stock is all over the place! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
